alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:52PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Payette, southwestern Washington and northeastern Malheur Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 452 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Ontario, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Payette, Weiser, Moores Hollow and Annex around 510 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
